behaviour: It can slide 1 cell orthogonally or diagonally. If it has never been threatened and it has never moved, and there is a friendly rook 3 cells to its east that has never moved, it can slide 2 cells east then the rook will hop 2 cells west. If it has never been threatened and it has never moved, and there is a friendly rook 4 cells to its west that has never moved, it can slide 3 cells west then the rook will hop 2 cells east.
